resources.string: LightsOut is a puzzle where you are given a grid of cells, or lights, with some dark and others light. You must turn them all off by clicking on the cells. Each click toggles that cell and each of its immediate neighbors.
All valid LightsOut puzzles can be solved without clicking on any cell twice. This is because clicking on a cell twice is the same as not clicking it at all.
My name is John E.Y,I am a software engineer living in Massachusetts,I am currently a student at UML, and I love it,I created this game for people that are at work or in any boring situations
